app.name: Flappy Bird 3D
app.short_description: A Flappy Bird clone for Wii U
app.long_description:
A Flappy Bird clone for WiiU using 3D graphics Don't hit pipes! And don't fall down too!
Press A to start and jump
Uses SBS 3D, compatible TV/monitor required.
Credits: rw-r-r_0644 - Original Flappy Bird GX2
